scripts.bookmarklet: echo 'export const bookmarkletCode = `' > inputs/blobs/utils/bookmarklet.new.js && cat inputs/blobs/utils/bookmarklet.raw.js >> inputs/blobs/utils/bookmarklet.new.js && truncate -s -3  inputs/blobs/utils/bookmarklet.new.js && echo '.call(this));`;' >> inputs/blobs/utils/bookmarklet.new.js
